value.title: Import images in Power BI from local sources

He shows in his blog post how you can import images in Power BI from your local folder for offline use. Read more about it here: http://sqljason.com/2018/01/embedding-images-in-power-bi-using-base64.html  and

value.title: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression
